alert.note: Alert for Decatur (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 17 at 12:33PM EDT until May 17 at 1:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 100 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN GADSDEN...CENTRAL LEON AND SOUTHEASTERN DECATUR COUNTIES... At 1233 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Quincy, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Quincy, Havana, Gretna, Attapulgus, Freemont, Littman, Douglas City, Mount Pleasant, Florence, Scotland, Jamieson, Gibson, Laingkat, Santa Clara, Shady Rest, Amsterdam, Quincy Airport, Branchville, Sawdust and Hinson. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
